response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that holds immense value for you. This extraordinary item is priced at $1,200,000, which I believe strikes a balance between its true worth and your perceived valuation. My goal is to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction. Should you choose to accept this offer, it would be a significant milestone in our business relationship. If you require any additional information or have concerns about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to hearing your decision.", "product_price": 1200000}
